text: North Khorasan Province (, Ostān-e Khorāsān-e Shomālī and Kurdish: Xorasani kurdi) is a province in northeastern Iran. Its capital is Bojnord. == References == == Other websites == * The text of the law for division of Khorasan into three provinces (in Persian) * Cultural Heritage Foundation of Khorasan Category:Khorasan
title: North Khorasan province
